ResearchProjectDef.label: Fish Industry: aquaculture
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Fish Industry provides you all means to produce your own tasty seafood. Learn how to adapt your hydroponics into aquaculture to breed seafood.
- Develop the aquaculture basin.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered:
You have developped a modified version of the hydroponic basin: the aquaculture basin.
- You can now build the aquaculture basin to breed seafood.
